name: OAuth2-Proxy
description: 一个反向代理，提供 Google、Azure、OpenID Connect 和许多其他身份提供商的身份验证。

notes.text: This application includes a blank configuration file by default due to the wide range of available configuration options. We recommend referring to the official documentation for guidance: `https://oauth2-proxy.github.io/oauth2-proxy/configuration/overview`. With this you can make your config.toml file accordingly to your needs.
After changing the config restart OAuth2-Proxy with: `systemctl restart oauth2-proxy`
